overview:
Greg has been a leader in the deployment and successful implementation of Internet applications and integrated technologies.

Greg Darby is a senior technologist with more than 30 years of experience developing, launching and supporting data intensive, large-scale business applications. Over the past 20 years, he has led or consulted on several successful Web-based businesses including CIN, an early social networking community developed as a CompuServe Business Partner in 1992, and a provider of e-commerce solutions, Internet broadcasting and a large scale managed hosting data center. Prior to CIN, Greg was a principal of Creative Computer Concepts, a full-service technology consulting firm headquartered in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Previously, Greg was CEO of Darby and Way, Inc., a consulting engineering firm recognized as a leader in the use of technology and was the principal consultant on several highly publicized projects for corporate and institutional clients.
